name: underscores
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called Due_Processed, or underscores, if you like. I'm a theme meant for hacking so don't use me as a Parent Theme. Instead try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. That's what I'm here for.
author: Automattic Theme Team

scripts.compile: npm run compile:css && npm run compile:rtl
scripts.lint: npm run lint:scss && npm run lint:js
scripts.prebundle: npm run lint && npm run compile && cd ../wp-content/themes && ls && rm -rf ./due-processed/*
scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../wp-content/themes/due-processed/due-processed.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md .prettierrc composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist sass style.css.map
